description: Person carrying two burdens, triangle or diamond for a head

features.description: What shape are the burdens? 0 = oval, 1 = circle, 2 = triangle, 3 = indeterminate, 4 = none
Are the burdens suspended by ropes? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = N/A
Are there both arms and a yoke support? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = arms look like the yoke
What shape is the head? 0 = triangle, 1 = diamond, 2 = caret
